campaign.name: Renewable energy
campaign.text: Start an information campaign on the advantages of renewable energy. Increases acceptance of renewable energy and their related policies by n %.

campaign.name: Home insulation
campaign.text: Start an information campaign explaining the advantages of home insulation. Increases acceptance of home insulation and their related policies by n %.

policy.name: Mandatory rooftop solar PV
policy.text: Solar PV must be installed on all suitable rooftops within n turn. Increase of solar energy production by n %.

policy.name: Enable alpine solar PV
policy.text: Limitation of appeals to large scale solar projects. Increase solar plant upgrades from 1 to 3.

policy.name: Fast track wind parks
policy.text: Limitation of the possibilities of appeal for wind parks. Lowers required building time for wind parks from 2 to 0.

policy.name: Wind parks regulation
policy.text: Limitation of the possibilities of appeal for wind parks. Increase wind parks upgrades from 2 to 5.

policy.name: Mandatory Building Insulation
policy.text: All buildings must be insulated within n turns. Lowers energy demand by n.

policy.name: Industry Subsidy
policy.text: Provide industries with grants for less energy intensive production. Lowers energy demand from Industry by n.
